column4: not really ubuntu related but specifically on irc. Not all the time will you disconnect from irc with your own personal quit message displayed
you mean instead of 'Penguin_Guy has disconnected', I could have something like 'Penguin_Guy waddles off'?
yeah for example, though on various irc clients it would display in various fashions for a standard quit message
I see, thanks! Just gonna test this out.
